messages: Brad: Phone, wallet, keypass... Phone, wallet, keypass..
(Bradley, you son of a donkey. If only you were more aware of your surroundings. You had so much potential in elementary...)
Brad: ...Phone, wallet... *sigh* Allen's girlfriend is still there... I'd talk with her, but I don't even know what to say.
Brad: But last time I tried, she got angry and threw up on me...
(Okay, I feel bad for you now.)
Brad: If only there was something I could do for her...
